input.sentences: we went to the evolution museum to look at the statues .
we found this smaller nugget of a brain .
we also found some interesting facial masks .
they got much closer to human appearance .
the very final mask was the most creepy .
output.sentences: The statues in the museum showed the process of evolution.
There was a model of what looked like a nugget foundd in an ancestors brain.
They also had many masks that were found showing facial features from thousands of years ago.
Then there was a model that had a closer appearance of a human.
The final mask was very creepy.
